npm

Updating package.json

I hate when my package.json doesn't show the latest version after I upgrade my repository. I am aware the latest version of these packages can be checked in package-lock.json or yarn.lock but still I hate if they are not present in my package.json So what am I going to do about it? Well I can delete and reinstall all the dependencies and devDependencies. Its one of the most straightforward solution. So I wrote few lines of code which does exactly the same in bash For Yarn # clean old or unwa
